title: discoflea
author: discoflea
content: Basically title. I'm trying to build an ASIC/lottery miner and wanted to use bm1387/b chips as they have decent hashrate and are fairly cheaply available. For communication I am planning to either use an ESP-32 module or possibly an RP2040?

comments.author: BitMaxz
comments.body: No one yet sharing this datasheet here bm1384 datasheet is the only available here and you can also download it on Bitmain. Why not check this post from Reddit he might have a datasheet for bm1387/b because he is trying to develop something with this ASIC chip. - https://www.reddit.com/r/BitcoinMining/comments/uymwj3/experimental_bm1387_bitcoin_mining_machine/

comments.author: paid2
comments.body: Quote from: BitMaxz on June 11, 2022, 10:03:46 PMWhy not check this post from Reddit he might have a datasheet for bm1387/b because he is trying to develop something with this ASIC chip. - https://www.reddit.com/r/BitcoinMining/comments/uymwj3/experimental_bm1387_bitcoin_mining_machine/Thank you for this very interesting link !This Github from the link provided me some really usefull informations
